page.title: 20SHOPPING
page.content: We have a wide variety of shops in Stanley Front St.:_ Elect./H_hold 10 Clothing 13 Building Soc. 7 Supermarkets 6 Furniture 5 Shoes 4 Greengrocers 3 Newsagents 3 Bakers 3 Chemists 3 Post Office 1 Take-Away food 5 Jewellers 2 Butchers 2 Video 2 Florist 1 Each Thursday an open air market is held on Front St.June 16th 1985 there were 45 stalls selling a wide range of goods.We also have a market hall opened in 1925 on the site of the old open-air market. Saturday Survey of Shoppers(11am-noon) SHOPPERS FLOOR SPACE(ft2) SHOP 243 19 500 FINE FARE 200 4 200 LAWS 249 19 000 PRESTO
